chrome-devtools._description: Chrome DevTools for UI/UX testing - screenshot, inspect CSS, inject CSS, get page info

defectdojo-iec62443._description: DefectDojo IEC 62443 Compliance - Import scans, tag findings with FR/SR requirements, generate compliance reports

tailscale-devops._description: Tailscale DevOps automation and network management for INSA infrastructure - 10 tools for network status, SSH, tunnels, routing, access control, service discovery, traffic analysis, health checks, deployment, and optimization

erpnext-crm._description: ERPNext CRM automation for INSA Automation (LOCAL on iac1) - 29 tools for complete sales cycle: lead management, opportunities, quotations, sales orders, delivery notes, invoices, payments, customers, contacts, catalog, and analytics

inventree-crm._description: InvenTree inventory management for INSA Automation (LOCAL on iac1) - 5 tools for complete inventory and BOM tracking: list parts, get part details, create BOMs, calculate pricing, track customer equipment

cadquery-mcp._description: CadQuery CAD MCP for INSA Automation (bertvanbrakel) - Production-ready headless 3D CAD: execute scripts, STEP/STL/SVG export, part library management, BOM-driven CAD generation for ERPNext/InvenTree integration

mautic-admin._description: Mautic Marketing Automation Admin for INSA Automation - 27 COMPLETE ADMINISTRATIVE TOOLS: CLI installation, system config, contacts (CRUD), segments (create/update), campaigns (trigger/rebuild), email queue, broadcasts, maintenance, cleanup, webhooks, imports, stats - Full programmatic control via CLI + REST API

grafana-admin._description: Grafana Analytics Admin for INSA Automation - 25+ COMPLETE ADMINISTRATIVE TOOLS: dashboards (list/get/create/update/delete), data sources (list/get/create/update/delete), users, organizations, alerts, notification channels, annotations, health monitoring, stats, backup, CLI operations (reset password, plugins) - Full programmatic control via REST API + Docker CLI

mautic-browser-automation._description: Mautic Browser Automation for INSA Automation - HEADLESS BROWSER CONTROL: create landing pages via UI automation, create forms, screenshot debugging, login verification, list pages - Puppeteer-based automation for operations not available via API

n8n-admin._description: n8n Workflow Automation Admin for INSA Automation - 23 COMPLETE ADMINISTRATIVE TOOLS: workflow management (list/get/create/update/delete/activate/duplicate), execution control (list/get/trigger/retry/cancel/delete), credential management (list/get/create/delete), monitoring & analytics (stats/workflow_stats/execution_summary/health_check), administration (settings/export_workflows) - Full autonomous control for ERPNext ↔ Mautic integration workflows

n8n-mcp._description: n8n MCP Server - Full headless workflow control with 536 nodes, 90% docs coverage. Enables Claude Code to create, manage, and execute n8n workflows programmatically. Production-ready for ERPNext ↔ Mautic integration. CLI-based setup complete!
